summary: Publish composite telemetry quilt for downstream consumers.

directives.details: Author schema documentation under `planning/toyfoundry/telemetry/export_schema.md` describing composite quilt fields required by toysoldiers_ai_0.
Produce machine-readable exports (JSON and CSV) from the composite quilt at `.toyfoundry/telemetry/quilt/exports/` so downstream teams can ingest data automatically.
Extend `tools/telemetry/quilt_loom.py` (or companion script) with a flag to regenerate exports in step with rollup generation.
Drop sample files and `README.md` guidance in the export directory documenting command usage and expected consumer workflow.
Submit acknowledgement and factory report summarising export readiness, integration notes, and follow-on telemetry requests.
